definitions: a person or thing weighing a specified number of pounds

examples.text: Sloan set a blue-shark record with a 184-pounder

shortDefinitions: person or thing weighing specified number of pounds

definitions: a gun designed to fire a shell weighing a specified number of pounds.
shortDefinitions: gun designed to fire shell weighing specified number of pounds

definitions: a person or thing that pounds something

examples.text: he's direct, but not abrasive, not a desk-pounder

shortDefinitions: person or thing that pounds something
